original_text: And the house which king Solomon built for the Lord, the length thereof was threescore cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits, and the height thereof thirty cubits.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 여호와를 위하여 건축한 성전은 길이가 육십 규빗이요 너비가 이십 규빗이요 높이가 삼십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: And the house which king Solomon built for the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 주님을 위해 지은 집은

sentences.original_text: and the height thereof thirty cubits
